DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study was to investigate the effects of training on the exercise capability, balance performance, and microcirculation. Furthermore, to search the possible underlying mechanisms.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise Capability and Training Effects in Diabetic Patients With Neuropathy
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes with neuropathy. Central nerve system dysfunction, hemiparesis, motion tremor, other musculoskeletal disease that might effect the outcome measurements.
